1. Unrar using Winrar/Winzip

2. Run installer/setup file

3. After installation ends, DO NOT UPDATE, close program completely(from taskbar as well)

4. open keygen.exe file

5. click patch, as said

5. now browse when asked(C:/>Program Files>IOBIT>advanced systemcare)

6. type AWC.exe and click open

7. now server check is killed

8. now,  use the generate button to generate the key and use the generated key to register

9. Done

Install .exe file

Close after install,I didnt even select a skin type

then open the key gen

put a name on the second line (NOT your true name noob)

then hit generate

copy code

close keygen

open the Advanced System care(it will still show free edition)

click upgrade button

then click enter activation code now

put name and code

Also, I use windows 7 and not only you have to run the keygen as administrator, you also have to run the program itself as administrator.

Window 7 user. Just downloaded and it worked. I just want to clarify a few steps on the "kegen patch" process. Hero_cake directions worked but i was confused as to what it means to drag it. What files, so here it is.

1. Unrar using Winrar/Winzip

2. Run installer/setup file

3. After installation ends, DO NOT UPDATE, close program completely(from taskbar as well)

4. open keygen.exe file

5. click "patch", as said and you'll get  pop up window.

5. Now go to your download folder and drag  the Advanced systemcare file into one single file like here. (C:/>Program Files>IOBIT>advanced systemcare)

6. Now, Right click on that Advance systemcare file you just drag in and Run as Admin. By doing this it created the file path like this :  
C:\Program Files\IObit\Advanced SystemCare 3\AWC.exe

6. click the drop down arrow and select the file path as above and click open

7. now server check is killed (you should get a displayed message)

8. To generate the key, type in a name before clicking the Generate button and use the generated key to register.
 Note: The picture was black. I almost could not find where to a name. There are 3 black lines on that black screen. Type a name on the 2nd line.
hope this helps.

9. Done

CORRECTIONS to step 6 above ongoing.. both Vista and window 7.
6. Now, click to open the Advance systemcare you just drag in. Then right click on the set up file and run as admin. By doing this it created the file path like this : 
C:\Program Files\IObit\Advanced SystemCare 3\AWC.exe

7. now click on Keygen file to open. click Patch and you will get a pop up window. click the drop down and select the file path. then click open.

7. now server check is killed (you should get a displayed message)

8. To generate the key, type in a name before clicking the Generate button and use the generated key to register.
Note: The picture was black. I almost could not find where to a name. There are 3 black lines on that black screen. Type a name on the 2nd line.
hope this helps.

9. Done
this patch also works with the latest version 3.7.0 :)
